00033 struct Prox
00034 {
00035     static const Prox PROX_SELF;
00036     static const Prox PROX_UNKNOWN;
00037     static const Prox PROX_TIMEOUT;
00038     //static const Prox PROX_WAITING;
00039 
00040     double proximity; // [0 - INF)
00041     double accuracy;  // [0 - 1] 1: exact value, 0: no information available
00042 
00043     operator double();
00044     operator simtime_t();
00045 
00046     Prox();
00047     Prox(simtime_t prox);
00048     Prox(simtime_t prox, double acc);
00049     Prox(double prox, double acc);
00050 
00051     bool operator==(Prox p) const;
00052     bool operator!=(Prox p) const;
00053 
00054     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Prox& prox);
00055 };
00056 
00057 struct ProxKey
00058 {
00059     ProxKey(const Prox& prox, const OverlayKey& key) : prox(prox), key(key) { };
00060     Prox prox;
00061     OverlayKey key;
00062 };

00065 class ProxNodeHandle : public NodeHandle
00066 {
00067   protected:
00068     Prox prox;
00069 
00070   public:
00071     static const ProxNodeHandle UNSPECIFIED_NODE;

00075     virtual ~ProxNodeHandle();
00076 
00077     inline void setProx(Prox prox) { this->prox = prox; };
00078     inline Prox getProx() const { return prox; };
